meanings.definition: To convert an image into pixels.
meanings.sent1: She pixellates the photo to make it clearer.
meanings.sent2: The software pixellates the image for better quality.
meanings.sent3: When she pixellates the picture, it looks like a puzzle!
meanings.sent4: His mind pixellates the details, creating a mosaic of memories.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully pixellates each section, adding depth to the artwork.

meanings.definition: To cause an image to appear pixelated.
meanings.sent1: The poor internet connection pixellates the video.
meanings.sent2: The old camera often pixellates the photos.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to fix the TV only made the screen pixellate more!
meanings.sent4: The fog outside the window pixellates the view into a dreamlike haze.
meanings.sent5: The rain on the window pane pixellates the cityscape into a blurry painting.
